title: Watch Face with Zombies
summary: Download now and enjoy Watch Face with Zombies !

descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Watch Face with Zombies is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
Watch out, a group of scary zombies will make your device screen look awesome. Check it out , you will definitely like it. Download now Watch Face with Zombies and have fun.
How to setup Watch Face with Zombies:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Watch Face with Zombies.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Watch Face with Zombies app settings menu.
Watch Face with Zombies is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: Very nice Love this watch face. Please upload something more
Love this watch face. Please make an option for digital clock.
